name: Mentor Me
overview:
We create mentoring matches that last.

Half of all matches between mentors and youth end within the first few months. These shortened matches do more harm than no mentoring at all. With 3 million kids in the U.S. being mentored and 15 million more still waiting to be matched, this is a serious problem. The number one reason for the matches falling apart is poor matching.

We provide cloud-based mentor matching and management tools that make mentoring more efficient and more effective for both organizations and the mentors themselves.

Organizations subscribe to our platform based on a sliding scale, paying a monthly price that increases with the number of mentees in their program.

In return they gain better matches, streamlined communications tools, better metrics and saved time & cost expenditures.

We’re starting in youth mentoring and within 3 years, we’ll expand into the higher education and professional mentoring spaces.
